price: Sεdeε Ɔbɛtua wͻn so ka pεpεεpε na Ɔde N’adom no bi bεka ho ama wͻn. Nokorε sε Ɔne Bͻnefakyε Hene, Ɔne Ayɛyie Wura.
arabic: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: liyuwaffiyahum ujūrahum wayazīdahum min faḍlihi innahu ghafūrun shakūrun
translations: That He may give them in full
